survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the experiences and challenges faced by urban bicycle commuters to improve infrastructure and services.

questions.question_text: How often do you commute by bicycle in a typical week?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you commute by bicycle in a typical week?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for commuting by bicycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for commuting by bicycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the average distance of your bicycle commute (one way)?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover typical urban commute distances.

script.question_text: What is the average distance of your bicycle commute (one way)?

questions.question_text: How safe do you feel while cycling in your city?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with radio buttons. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How safe do you feel while cycling in your city?

questions.question_text: What types of bicycle infrastructure do you frequently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of bicycle infrastructure do you frequently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when commuting by bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed responses. Encourage specificity.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when commuting by bicycle?

questions.question_text: Do you use a personal bicycle or a bike-sharing service for your commute?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Do you use a personal bicycle or a bike-sharing service for your commute?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bicycle parking at your destinations?
questions.routing_logic: Display to respondents who answered 'Personal bicycle' or 'Both' in Q7.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with radio buttons. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bicycle parking at your destinations?
script.routing_logic: Display to respondents who answered 'Personal bicycle' or 'Both' in Q7.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability and condition of bike-sharing stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Display to respondents who answered 'Bike-sharing service' or 'Both' in Q7.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with radio buttons. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability and condition of bike-sharing stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: Display to respondents who answered 'Bike-sharing service' or 'Both' in Q7.

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to commute by bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed responses. Encourage specificity.
